subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramírez homered and drove in four runs, Mike Lowell added a three-run shot and the Boston Red Sox held on for an 8-5 victory yesterday against the Chicago White Sox at Fenway Park.
snippet: Manny Ramírez homered and drove in four runs, Mike Lowell added a three-run shot and the Boston Red Sox held on for an 8-5 victory yesterday against the Chicago White Sox at Fenway Park.
